result.execSummary:
The defendant Linda F Morris was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 30 days to pay or 20 days KCJ.
30 days to pay or 20 days KCJ.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Linda F Morris

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Time to Pay Summary - $967 due.  Failure to pay, 20 days KCJ.  kmk
$957 due.  Failure to pay, 20 days KCJ.  kmk

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Lauren Breckenfelder.  Case is resolved.  Victim rights compliance.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft fined $400 plus costs.  30 DTP.  In default, 20 days KCJ.  DNA ordered; notice given to deft.  Appeal rights.    NOTE - deft reports due to health issues - she cannot complete work crew

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared (15min late) w/Atty Lauren Breckenfelder.  Defense counsel requests an adjournment - deft started new medication yesterday and is little a groggy this morning.  Plea hrg adj to 5/31/16 @ 10:30am.  Deft instructed she needs to be on time for court appearances.
Deft appeared later in the morning - approx 11am.  Deft is ill - instructed to return @ 9am on 5/4/16

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Atty Lauren Breckenfelder appeared on behalf of deft.  No appearance by deft.  BW authorized; $1,000 cash bond.  Prior bond forfeited.  Stayed until Wednesday (5/4/16) @ 9am.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Lauren Breckenfelder.  Defense counsel reports she is still waiting for add'l discovery.  JS to remain on for 5/2/16 @ 9am.  Attys to notify the court by 5pm on 4/27/16 if the case is resolved; otherwise no plea bargaining will be allowed after that date.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.  kmk
